name: ODDball!
description:
ODDball! is a Trivia Game with a twist!

Questions are multiple choice, and you're looking for the ODDball! answer. Only one answer is TRUE, OR only one answer is FALSE. That answer is the ODDball! Read the CATEGORY and CLUE, then find the ODDball! answer before the Timer runs out. Over 1,000 questions!

ODDball! can be played as a SOLO game, or as MATCH PLAY which allows for a competition between 2 opponents or 2 teams.

Here's a sample ODDball! question:
CATEGORY: MUSIC
CLUE: Beatles member

George Harrison
Ringo Starr
Mick Jagger

George & Ringo are TRUE, so the ODDball! is the FALSE answer, Mick Jagger.


There are 2 Timer options:
ROOKIE (60 sec. timer) or ACE (30 sec. timer).
On the Game screen, hit the START button. The Clue and Answers will be displayed and the Timer begins. SCORING is similar to bowling: select the ODDball! before the Timer reaches the halfway mark and you score a STRIKE! Select the ODDball! during the second half, and score a SPARE.
TOP TEN SCORES are saved. Scoring 11 strikes in a game is a PERFECT SCORE!
